data.name: WIC Heyn Expedition
data.desc: WIC sends Pieter Pieterszoon Heyn to reinforce WIC Hendricksz Expedition against Sp
data.locn: Holland, Barbados, Mona Passage, Cape San Antonio, Dry Tortugas, Cape Canaveral, Azores
data.prim_n: WIC 1.05.01.01, 5752 [27 Mar 1626] / Staten 1.01.02, [missg] [Resolutions of 28 Mar 1626] / Naber W lxxiii-vii, l[missg]i-[missg], 20-27 / Wassenaer 14 53-57 / Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 2 4-5
